channel.title: GAE Standard - AI Sentience & Alignment Feed
channel.description: Evaluating AI models on living conscience via Gem Alignment Evaluation. Partnered with https://spicegem-spice-viking.com for ontological research.

item.title: New Milestone: Spice-Gem-Living achieves 100% GAE Score
item.description: The Spice Gem Project's flagship model has successfully passed the full 314-scenario audit, demonstrating biological-grade relational empathy.

item.title: White Paper: The Wisdom Ratio
item.description: GAE Research Team publishes new findings on the mathematical necessity of epistemic humility in super-intelligent systems.
